907 591 evaluation properly 594 474 595 would 599 retrieval 358 359 because 915 based 15 18 personal an 484 1 243 364 as 2 486 124 3 125 4 127 7 129 9 803 conditions argued be criterion experiments 29 1242 utility plausible 492 1357 378 1235 1356 systems are 1354 by 810 811 812 814 816 817 818 a 35 1374 i 1373 1372 procedure 381 1370 382 the s 1247 1368 t 1004 1367 1366 820 w 700 1364 x 822 823 703 824 to under 705 826 827 42 707 43 708 829 evidence 1264 1263 390 152 274 1016 1015 830 1377 1376 1375 simplifying 54 which given 57 58 test this 1030 users 165 167 measure 961 1268 962 hypothetical 843 964 1386 844 603 604 846 726 606 727 728 609 elicitation for 1285 1282 1281 175 296 297 298 610 731 611 732 1035 612 733 734 70 615 736 73 738 739 selecting 619 effectiveness 1297 better with 740 620 741 621 742 743 744 1045 625 626 748 84 508 629 compromise 509 gleaned 190 191 197 output 630 631 752 994 william 511 512 754 875 634 755 514 756 515 636 516 637 879 518 if 519 validation is it underlying 1195 520 762 883 521 642 522 643 764 523 644 524 525 646 526 527 648 528 649 529 methods 1084 650 530 893 531 652 532 895 534 535 1078 1091 means could discussed more 780 660 300 301 785 302 deriving 546 1089 impractical 307 certain 1405 measuring use him assumptions 791 that outlined 553 795 554 313 presented from 319 kind 1303 444 565 445 447 448 207 449 1307 1427 their best 450 692 330 451 452 211 574 575 696 nearideal along 214 456 577 and 699 of 458 579 459 218 1319 on subjective or 1327 quantified suggested 222 performance 223 224 1201 468 cooper methodology 1207
